name: Socialize-frontend
description: Frontend of the a social media website built using ReactJS ⚛️where user can upload a post , like, comment and reply on other posts.

name: Socialize-backend
description: Backend of a social media website built using NodeJS where user can upload a post, like, comment and reply on other posts.

name: Online Learning Platform
description: A web app where teachers 👨‍🏫 can upload content and students 👨‍🎓 can login/signup and watch the content and can also review the content. It also consists of quiz 📝 which can be setup by teachers.
